snippet.title: BLOCKAGE: Find the Source of Your Strange Symptoms in this Psychological Horror Game
snippet.description:
Support our project on: http://www.patreon.com/5mg
Download FREE and more: https://www.5mgsite.com/post/blockage-find-the-source-of-your-strange-symptoms-in-this-psychological-horror-game
Don't click here: https://bit.ly/35L4LXh 

Game Description
Blockage is a short (and weird) indie Action, Interactive Fiction and Visual Novel game that was produced by dis0rder and Ankea for this year's Ludum Dare and published on April 5th on the itch.io platform. In Blockage, you follow the story of a guy who, on a certain day at work, began to notice that he was having difficulty concentrating, in addition to not feeling the taste of food anymore and suffering a certain numbness in his face. He feels that there is something in his head that is bothering him, but he doesn't know what it is. From there, you are taken inside his mind, where you, now a strange acorn, must explore it and thus find the source of the strange symptoms that person is experiencing.


NEW - 5mg Magazine #7 - Demons of Asteborg:  https://www.5mgsite.com/magazine
Subscribe and get access to news and our Discord server: https://mailchi.mp/1d6e93f3d1cb/5mg

#indiegames #indiegame

Note¹: This is not a guide, but my experience playing games, sometimes, for the first time.
